org.dotplot.core.system
Class CoreSystem

java.lang.Object
  org.dotplot.core.plugins.Plugin
      org.dotplot.core.system.CoreSystem
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPlugin, IServiceExtentionActivator
public class CoreSystem
extends Plugin

Instantces of this class provides for basic Services and Jobs to load plugins into the system.

The CoreSystem provides for tree Services:

  1. PluginLoadingService - for loading Plugins
  2. PluginIntegrationService - for integrating the Services of the loaded Plugins into to system
  3. InitializerService - for initializing the integrated Services

The CoreSystem provides for tree Jobs:

  1. PluginLoadingJob - loads the Plugins
  2. StartUpJob - executes Jobs assigned to the InizializerService for startup.
  3. ShutDownJob - executes Jobs assigned to the InizializerService for shutdown.

Author:
Christian Gerhardt
See Also:
PluginLoadingService, PluginIntegrationService, InitializerService, PluginLoadingJob, ShutdownJob, StartUpJob
